overview: Manuel Jordan is a man who is free after serving 23 years for killing a teenager during an attempted robbery. After nearly two decades of staring at his victim's face on a newspaper clipping in his cell, the newly paroled man seeks redemption. Instead, redemption—in the form of a mysterious minister and two needy women— finds him.
tagline: How you gonna make it right?
cast: Billy Bob Thornton|Morgan Freeman|Holly Hunter|Kirsten Dunst|Manuel Aranguiz
